title: The Lost Thing
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Social aspects
abstract: The award winning animated short film based on the illustrated book by Shaun Tan.
description: Set in a city overrun by bureaucracy, this Oscar Award winning animated short film of Shaun Tan's picture book 'The Lost Thing', tells the story of a boy who befriends a strange creature that doesn't appear to fit in any of the available pigeonholes.
